Column.Name: Estimated Value
Column.ValidationFormula: IF( $thisValue = NULL, $thisColumn & " is required", $thisValue > HASH_GET([Procurement Settings], "Quick Quotes - Estimated Value Threshold"), "The amount you have entered is higher than that allowed for this process." )

Column.Name: Close DateTime
Parent Structure
Procurement Settings

Binding.Expression:
"
"

Information.Text: Give a name or title to your quote.

Label.Text: Note this figure is hidden from suppliers.

Information.Text: Provide an estimated budget for the quote. This will not be shown to suppliers.

NumericTextBox.PlaceholderText: Enter the estimated value in dollars

Binding.Expression: IF([Estimated Value] > HASH_GET([Procurement Settings], "Quick Quotes - Estimated Value Threshold"), "#ff5d5d", "#e2e2e2")

"
"
AND( [Estimated Value] > HASH_GET([Procurement Settings], "Quick Quotes - Estimated Value Threshold"), [GTM Request ID] = NULL )

TextBox.PlaceholderText: Include important information such as goods or services required, expected timing, location of delivery, or if services can be provided remotely etc.

Information.Text: Please provide a description of your requirements or needs.
Choose suppliers to invite for a quote.

Binding.Expression: AND( [Supplier Selection] == NULL, [GTM Request ID] = NULL )

"
"
AND( [Supplier Selection] <> NULL, [GTM Request ID] = NULL )

Information.Text: Attach any files you want to include with your request.
Set the deadline for suppliers to respond.

Label.Text: Set the closing date and time for suppliers to respond by.

Binding.Expression: ARRAY( HASH("text", "5 AM", "value", 5), HASH("text", "6 AM", "value", 6), HASH("text", "7 AM", "value", 7), HASH("text", "8 AM", "value", 8), HASH("text", "9 AM", "value", 9), HASH("text", "10 AM", "value", 10), HASH("text", "11 AM", "value", 11), HASH("text", "12 PM", "value", 12), HASH("text", "1 PM", "value", 13), HASH("text", "2 PM", "value", 14), HASH("text", "3 PM", "value", 15), HASH("text", "4 PM", "value", 16), HASH("text", "5 PM", "value", 17), HASH("text", "6 PM", "value", 18), HASH("text", "7 PM", "value", 19), HASH("text", "8 PM", "value", 20), HASH("text", "9 PM", "value", 21), HASH("text", "10 PM", "value", 22) )
OR( [Estimated Value] > HASH_GET([Procurement Settings], "Quick Quotes - Estimated Value Threshold"), [GTM Request ID] <> NULL )

"
"

"
Your quote has been sent to suppliers
"

TriggerCustomEvent.EventArgumentsFormula: HASH( "Request Source", ARRAY(EFormType, RecordID), "Requester System Name", "Quick Quote", "Request Type", "Go to SD", "CorrelationId", [SD Request GUID] )

FormulaCriterion.Formula: AND([API Request RecordID] <> NULL, [GTM Request ID] <> NULL)
